header_text: Your child wants to go trick-or-treating, and they begged you to dress up with them. You wear a costume and run into some people from work who aren't dressed up. They think your costume is awesome.

elements.Text: Do the people from work think you're lame for going trick-or-treating?

elements.name: Your child wants to go trick-or-treating, and they begged you to dress up with them. You wear a costume and run into some people from work who aren't dressed up. They think your costume is awesome._Social Situations_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
